backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing account management with authorization, auto-generated IDs, transaction history, and transfer logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON object summarizing major frontend files and their purposes across UI, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/.env.development.example: Template environment file for development mode configuring backend mode and REST base URL.
frontend/.env.example: Default environment template specifying backend mode and REST API URL.
frontend/.env.staging.example: Staging environment template enabling REST mode with a staging API URL.
frontend/.vscode/extensions.json: VS Code extension recommendations for linting, formatting, Motoko, Git tools, and Tailwind.
frontend/.vscode/tasks.json: VS Code task definitions for installing dependencies, running frontend, starting dfx, deploying canisters, and building.
frontend/admin-portal/.env.example: Environment template for the admin portal defining backend mode, URL, canister ID, and environment.
frontend/admin-portal/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the admin portal React app into the admin-root div.
frontend/admin-portal/README.md: Explains the purpose, features, environment setup, and development workflow for the standalone ArthaNidhi Admin Portal React app.
frontend/admin-portal/src/AdminApp.tsx: Root component configuring routing, authentication provider, theming, and the admin layout.
frontend/admin-portal/src/backend/adminB: Placeholder backend client supporting IC/REST modes with stubbed admin operations.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/aut: Route guard that restricts access to authenticated admin users and redirects others.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/lay: Header component with branding, theme toggle, and admin account menu with logout.
Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and page structure for admin views.
frontend/admin-portal/src/config/env.ts: Loads and validates admin-specific environment variables for backend mode and config.
frontend/admin-portal/src/contexts/Admin: Implements localStorage‑based admin authentication with signup, login, and session management.
frontend/admin-portal/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps and renders the AdminApp React application.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AccessDe: Displays an access‑denied message with a prompt to return to login.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminDas: Admin dashboard showing placeholder stats and future admin feature descriptions.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminFor: Provides an admin password reset form and shows a confirmation message after submission.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminLog: Implements admin login with email/password, error handling, and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminSig: Contains admin account creation form with validation and redirects on successful signup.
frontend/admin-portal/src/styles/admin.c: Imports the main index.css file for admin portal styling.
frontend/DELIVERY_PLAN_BATCHES.md: Batch-based delivery plan detailing file groups for user and admin portals and how to assemble them.
frontend/docs/CHAT_EXPORT_FORMAT.md: Describes the required format for exporting the entire project code via chat.
Explains how to reconstruct the project locally from chat-delivered source files.
frontend/docs/GITHUB_ONBOARDING.md: Provides instructions for pushing the project to a new GitHub repository.
frontend/docs/LOCAL_DEVELOPMENT.md: Guides users through setting up and running the project locally.
frontend/docs/VSCODE_SETUP.md: Covers recommended VS Code setup and extensions for working on the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, and dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application.
frontend/README.md: User portal README describing project overview, stack, prerequisites, and setup instructions.
frontend/REST_BACKEND_CONTRACT.md: Specification of the REST API contract with security requirements, endpoint structure, and implementation notes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures application routing, providers, and layout for the main user portal.
frontend/src/backendClient/config.ts: Reads and validates backend mode and REST base URL from environment variables, providing a BackendConfig object.
frontend/src/backendClient/icClient.ts: Implements BackendClient using a Motoko actor, handling accounts, transactions, and mock market data for IC mode.
frontend/src/backendClient/index.ts: Factory module that selects and caches either the IC or REST backend client based on configuration.
frontend/src/backendClient/restClient.ts: Implements BackendClient over HTTP, performing authenticated fetch requests with BigInt-safe JSON handling.
frontend/src/backendClient/types.ts: Defines the BackendClient interface, backend mode types, and backend configuration structure.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Redirects unauthenticated users and shows a loading indicator while authentication state is resolving.
frontend/src/components/balance/BalanceA: Displays a balance string, masking digits with bullets when balance visibility is off.
frontend/src/components/balance/BalanceV: Button to toggle balance visibility using an eye/eye-off icon.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GoldSi: UI card showing dummy gold and silver price calculations based on selected city, karat, and weight.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/NewsCa: Renders a financial news card using mock data with scrollable items and a disclaimer banner.
Provides the main app layout with header, footer, and responsive sidebar behavior based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays the site footer with branding and demo disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the top header with navigation, theme toggle, user menu, and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Renders a navigational sidebar with scroll controls, mobile support, and route-aware highlighting.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: A dialog for sending money that validates inputs and triggers a transfer mutation.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides a demo localStorage‑based authentication system with signup, login, and session persistence.
frontend/src/contexts/BalanceVisibilityC: Manages balance visibility state using sessionStorage and exposes a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and AuthClient management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data‑fetching hooks for accounts and user profiles, handling actor readiness, REST vs IC modes, and auto‑refetching logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Syncs theme settings with backend preferences and provides a toggle that updates both local and backend state.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and color variables, including light/dark fintech themes and background effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays account, balance, and financial health data with charts, loading states, and identifier‑generation feedback.
frontend/src/pages/BeneficiariesPage.tsx: Manages a user's saved beneficiaries with load/save to storage, form validation, add/remove actions, and a dialog UI.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Displays a simulated debit card with number masking and lets users freeze/unfreeze the card, persisting state in storage.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user greeting, balance, recent transactions, and dashboard widgets using backend query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DepositsPage.tsx: Lists demo deposit products and provides a simple FD maturity calculator based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Provides a demo password reset flow where users submit email and receive a confirmation message.
frontend/src/pages/GoldSilverRatesPage.t: Displays gold and silver rate information along with an explanatory section about pricing factors and karat details.
frontend/src/pages/InsurancePage.tsx: Renders a filterable list of demo insurance products with coverage, premiums, and features displayed in cards.
frontend/src/pages/LoansPage.tsx: Shows demo loan products and includes an EMI calculator where users input principal, rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login form with email/password handling, error display, loading state, and post-login navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MarketInsightsPage.ts: Fetches and displays simulated market summary data with trend indicators and a detailed table.
frontend/src/pages/MutualFundsPage.tsx: Displays simulated mutual fund data with performance metrics and a detailed funds table.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Renders a notifications list with filtering, read-state management, and persistence via local storage. Includes demo seed data and utilities for formatting timestamps and category colors.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Provides a demo bill payment form with category selection, validation, simulated processing, and success/error toasts. Resets form after submitting and displays payment-related UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Loads and edits user profile data, allowing name updates and theme toggling with loading states and mutation handling. Syncs form fields with backend profile or auth fallback.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsOffersPage.tsx: Displays categorized reward offers with the ability to save or unsave items, persisting selections per user. Supports filtering via tabs and shows demo-mode alerts.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Handles user signup with validation, KYC fields, account creation, and backend profile saving. Redirects after successful signup and manages loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/StatementsPage.tsx: Renders the statements page with filters, search, date range, and CSV export for transactions using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/StocksPage.tsx: Displays simulated stock data with summaries, loading skeletons, and a full table view using useGetStocks.
frontend/src/pages/SupportContactPage.ts: Implements a support portal with ticket submission, local persistence, and tabs for contact, tickets, and help topics.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript types for transactions, settings, market data, mutual funds, and stocks used across the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Exports transactions to CSV by formatting rows and triggering a download in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides INR currency formatting helpers for bigint and decimal amounts.
frontend/src/utils/jsonBigint.ts: Adds JSON helpers to serialize and parse bigint fields safely for REST compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/portalStorage.ts: Implements per-user localStorage helpers for saving beneficiaries, tickets, notifications, and related demo data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, extended shadows, radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project phase-1 UI/feature requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for ArthaNidhi Pay user and admin portals.
